description: The Philippine violet, or Barleria cristata, is an amazing plant species. It features stunning, bright purple flowers with coral-colored centers and bright green foliage. The flowers may bloom as single flowers and also in clusters, making this a great choice for flower bed or garden borders. This species prefers full sun and is drought and heat tolerant, thus making it an ideal choice for flower borders in hot climates. The fast-growing nature of this plant also makes it a winner for busy homes, as it is easy to take care of and able to fill up empty spaces quickly. The Philippine violet is an eye-catching choice for any garden!
